metadata.name: Crime
metadata.description:
As the creator of this collection, I was inspired by the surrealist style of Salvador Dali and the themes of "Crime and Punishment" by Fyodor Dostoevsky. I used my imagination and the power of AI to create four unique paintings, each depicting a different aspect of the novel.

The first painting, "Crime," is a representation of the act itself. The second painting, "Judgment," depicts the process of passing judgment and the weight of responsibility that comes with it. "Verdict" showcases the consequences of one's actions and the emotions that come with them. In "Punishment," I aimed to visually convey the retribution and the transformative power of punishment.

The collection is a surrealist journey into the depths of the human psyche, where the boundaries of right and wrong are blurred, and the consequences of our actions are magnified.

Discover your own interpretation, because surrealism does not limit your imagination.
 3600x3600, 300dpi
